std::map< std::string, ngl::Obj * > m_gameentity
 a map to hold our meshes by name

Detailed Description

this class creates the sphere primitive to define the game environment

this class creates the ground plane for the basket to move on

this class contains all meshes required in the game using this class, we load meshes once which can be attached to objects in game
